QuestData.Title: The Divine's Shield
QuestData.Description:
This island has been cursed by necrotic magic. The Light can only just reach this place.
Call upon its Divine Shield to step through the barrier before us unharmed and destroy this vile altar.
Show the darkness on this island that you are protected by the Light's embrace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Cross the necrotic barrier with Divine Shield and destroy the Necrotic Altar. You can speak with Yorah if you need to reduce Divine Shield's cooldown.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Yorah to lower Divine Shield's cooldown
